name: Quora Plain
description: Tahoma and Georgia instead of Arial. No bevels on buttons. More distinct separation between feed items. No hover cards - I use the cursor to read.
additional_info:
06.26.2013 Lots of adjustments for blogs and blog feeds.
04.11.2013 Top padding adjusted in response to Quora change.
02.16.2013 Georgia for blogs.
12.21.2012 Exception to background colors allows tooltips/ hover cards. 
12.08.2012 Reduced the size of the links menu inside an answer, which caused new scroll bars which caused the div to jump down. 
10.27.2012 Fixed font sizes coming from FF default.
Probably requires some upkeep.
